head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RICH, MARY C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RICH, MARY C.

block.p: RICH-Mary C. On May 8, 2000 in Stamford, CT. Beloved wife of the late Frank D. Rich, Sr., devoted mother of Frank D. Rich, Jr., and Robert N. Rich. Also survived ten grandchildren, and twenty-three great grandchildren. A Memorial Gathering will be held at noon Friday, May 12th at The Stamford Yacht Club, 97 Ocean Drive West, Stamford, CT. Funeral will be private. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made to The Boys and Girls Club of Stamford, Inc., 347 Stillwater Avenue, Stamford, CT. 06902.
